item.title: Minnesota Election Judge Charged Over Unregistered Votes
item.description: A head election judge serving in a Minnesota township has been charged with two felony counts for allegedly letting 11 people vote without being regis...

item.title: Trump Taps Brendan Carr for FCC Chairman
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump will tap Brendan Carr as chairman of the Federal Communications Commission, he said in a statement on Sunday.

item.title: Sen.-elect Schiff Doubles Down on Russia Hoax
item.description: Sen.-elect Adam Schiff, D-Calif., doubled down Sunday on the Russia hoax and said he would go after President-elect Donald Trump for unconstitutional ...

item.title: Rep. Cole: House GOP Should Work With Trump on 'His Objectives'
item.description: Republicans should "be working with" President-elect Donald Trump "to try and achieve his objectives," Rep. Tom Cole, R-Okla., told The Hill.
